name: Chicho Where Are You?
description: After falling asleep on her family trip to the city, 4 year old Himiko heads to bed realizing her best friend Chicho is nowhere to be seen. Due to her parents negligence, she takes it upon herself to head into the city late at night to find her lost puppy. Shortly after her escape, her parents discover she is gone and call in the police to bring their missing daughter home, but being caught will stop you from your mission!
